title: Angry Ola customer sets showroom on fire after repeated complaints about scooter purchased 20 days ago, arrested
description: A 26-year-old man has been arrested for allegedly setting fire to an Ola Electric showroom in Karnataka due to dissatisfaction with the servicing of his e-scooter. The incident highlights growing concerns over Ola Electric's service quality, as mechanics report significant backlogs and difficulties in handling complaints.
